amendment.description: At the end of subtitle E of title VIII, add the following: SEC. 8506. STREAMLINING THE FOREST SERVICE PROCESS FOR CONSIDERATION OF COMMUNICATIONS FACILITY LOCATION APPLICATIONS. (a) Definitions- In this section: ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to streamline the Forest Service application process required to construct broadband infrastructure on federal land.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
